Info.title: Maintaining Moving Sums over Data Streams

General Computer Science.reason: The title describes a fundamental problem in data processing, which falls under the umbrella of general computer science principles.

Computer Science (miscellaneous).reason: While the topic is specific, it doesn't neatly fit into many other sub-domains, making this a reasonable catch-all.

Computer Science Applications.reason: The title suggests a practical application of data stream processing, making this domain relevant.
